examples: I keep my dishes in the cupboard.
There's a secret compartment in the cupboard.
Eu guardo minha louça no armário.
Há um compartimento secreto no armário.

suggested: Why did the cupboard go to the doctor? Because it had a cabinet cough!
The feeling of sadness and loss when cleaning out a loved one's cupboard after they have passed away.
Feeling angry and frustrated when you can't find something you need in a messy and disorganized cupboard.
It can be surprising how much stuff you can fit into a well-organized and space-saving cupboard, or the secrets that can be uncovered when cleaning out an old cupboard.
The smell of old wood and varnish in a vintage cupboard, or the aroma of spices and herbs stored in a kitchen cupboard.
The physical sensation of touching the smooth surface of a freshly painted cupboard, or the rough texture of an old wooden one.
The connection to the past that can be felt when opening an antique cupboard, or the sense of pride and accomplishment when successfully organizing and decluttering a cluttered cupboard.
